message: I'm using the simple script header. Many users want to embed images from Facebook. FB used to provide a public URL for an image at the bottom of the image page, but no longer do. Do you know of any way to get FB images working with embedly now?
Not sure.  You could use the download link.
Interesting - that gets us halfway there... You're right, that does work with your explore example, but it doesn't work with the simple header script :(
Make sure you are specifying your key when using the script.  May I see the code you are adding to your page?
I don't see any reference to keys in your tutorials!

I didn't know there was such a thing as an embedly key. I'm using it as shown in your tutorial docs, e.g. http://embed.ly/docs/tutorials/simple . You can see it in action on any item page of bucketlist, e.g. http://bucketlist.org/i/8L0/
